verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Velledamu mari dhairyamutho krupaasanamu cheranu Thana kanikaramu krupalanu ponda thane sahayakudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Athmalanella prabhu rakshinchi thana mandiramunaku thechchi Thana aalayamulo meluponda vededamu manamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andariki rakshna kaluga rajulaku adhikaarulalo Sarvalokula ujeevamukai vededamu prabhune{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vakyamu vardilli vyapimpanu shatruni raajyamu koolunatlu Sevakulaatmato nimpabada vededamu manamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aathmato prabhu intini katti daani yandu prabhu mahimanindi Thana ghanatha vardhillunatlu vededamaayananu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sajeeva rallato illukatti nee adikaramu niluchunatlu devaa Nee hrudayaanusaarulanu lepamani vededam{/lang-eng}
